original_text: Then they put a dark red coat on Jesus. They used some branches with thorns to make a crown for him. They put it on his head.
korean_text: 예수에게 자색 옷을 입히고 가시관을 엮어 씌우고

sentences.original_text: Then they put a dark red coat on Jesus.
They used some branches with thorns
to make a crown for him.
They put it on his head.
